sub_title: BIM Engineer Bouwkunde at BAM Bouw Techniek
summary:
A passionate person with a desire to take on new challenges. With a great interest in architecture, BIM, and W-installation technology. Excited to gain more experience and improve my technical and design knowledge. My main goal is to learn the whole process of BIM engineer/manager and improve my digital skills. In addition to upgrading my professional level of communication skills and critical thinking in the design process. I have the drive and desire to further develop myself and am willing to go beyond my limits to excel in my chosen profession.

Specialties:

Architectural Design and Planning: Commercial, Residential, and Apartment Projects 

Master Planning, Detail Design, Construction Drawing, Cost Estimation, Scheduling

Urban Design and Planning: Sustainable Development, Land Use Planning

awards: [{'title': 'Attended conference of the Science 4 Refugees ', 'description': 'The Science4Refugees initiative is directed towards refugees researchers/scientists who have applied for and been granted asylum in a host country, which will enable them to continue their educational path or enter the labor market. Under the header "Science4Refugees" a number of initiatives will be brought together on the EURAXESS portal. I was invited to participate this conference after passing the eligibility of having the ability of working in the Eupropean Union.', 'issuer': 'Science 4 Refugees', 'date': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': 'Presenting Thesis Paper (Do the determinants of happiness differ between immigrants and home stayers? A comparison between Afghans in The Netherlands and Kabul) to the conference "A World to Win"', 'description': 'The theme of the first two days of the conference was The Happy Economy. The start of the conference on Monday 20 March has been consciously chosen to coincide with the 5th anniversary of the official UN International Day of Happiness on that day. After the first two days around The Happy Economy, the theme of the third day will be The Good Economy, and of the last two days The Examined Economy. \nMy thesis paper was accepted to be presented at the conference on the day of the Good Economy.', 'issuer': 'Erasmus Happiness Economics Research Organization (E-HERO) and Erasmus Institute for Philosophy and Economics (EIPE)', 'date': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': 'Joint Japan World Bank Graduate Scholarships program Winner of 2015-2016', 'description': None, 'issuer': 'Joint Japan World Bank Graduate Scholarships program (JJ/ WBGS)', 'date': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, {'title': 'Afghan National Standards Training of Trainee', 'description': 'I was certified for participation in 15 days Training of Trainees (ToT) program on Afghanistan Building Codes (General, Architectural, Urban, Highway & Street and Bridge Design Codes).', 'issuer': 'Afghan National Standards Authority (ANSA)', 'date': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, {'title': 'KABUL 2050 THE DIFFERENT FACES OF A CAPITAL', 'description': None, 'issuer': 'Kabul University, Kabul Polytechnic University, French Embassy, Agha Khan Foundation, and Norwegian Embassy', 'date': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}]

•	 land development concepts and urbanization trends.

•	Coordinate and manage urban design works with ministries and other internal divisions.
•	Assist other team members for the efficient planning and design of Kabul New City urban areas.
•	Review master plan, structure plan and detail developmental plan of entire urban area. 
•	Develop integrated land use models and land use plans.
•	Develop and design sustainable residential, commercial and industrial neighborhoods, districts, zones etc. based on urban designing principles. 
•	Preparation of weekly technical meetings and drafts amendments and recommendations in all urban design related issues.
•	Respond to stakeholders’ questions through written and oral communications in regard to the urban design issues.
•	Assists and coordinate DCDA urban planning activities with JICA technical team. 
•	Preparation of comprehensive technical reports.
•	Performs other duties as assigned.', 'title': 'Urban Designer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Safa Group', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'European Union Delegation For Afghanistan Share Naw', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Safa Group', 'description': 'Architectural Designing
